1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Message list.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Data.Type.Message
6  ( -- * Abortable
7    -- * Message
8    divideByZero,
9    heteroDecimal,
10    notDate,
11    tooLargeDigit,
12    notNumber,
13  ) where
14
15import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base       as B
16
17-- | Divide by zero
18divideByZero :: B.Ab a
19divideByZero = Left $ B.abortBecause "Divide by zero"
20
21-- | Different decimal length
22heteroDecimal :: String -> String -> B.Ab a
23heteroDecimal a b = Left $ B.abortLines "Different decimal length" [a, b]
24
25-- | Can't read as date
26notDate :: Integer -> Int -> Int -> B.Ab a
27notDate y m d = Left $ B.abortLines "Can't read as date"
28                [ "/year  " ++ show y
29                , "/month " ++ show m
30                , "/day   " ++ show d]
31
32-- | Too large digit
33tooLargeDigit :: String -> B.Ab a
34tooLargeDigit = Left . B.abortLine "Too large digit"
35
36-- | Can't read as number
37notNumber :: String -> B.Ab a
38notNumber = Left . B.abortLine "Can't read as number"
39
